name: orc-blog
description: A multi-user blog built with Orchestrate, UserApp, Node.js, and Angular.js

scripts.test: ./node_modules/.bin/jshint bin server client test index.js && npm run test-server && npm run test-client
scripts.test-client: ./node_modules/.bin/jscoverage client client-cov && ./node_modules/.bin/browserify client-cov/index.js test/client/app.js && ./node_modules/.bin/karma start karma.conf.js
scripts.coveralls: npm run coveralls-server && npm run coveralls-client
